events.message: I received the blender yesterday, but it is faulty. The motor is making a strange noise and it doesn’t blend properly at all.
The reported problem has been categorized as a Product Defect based on the customer's description of a faulty blender motor.
The case was assigned to a product specialist to handle the defect report for the blender.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your blender is not working correctly. I’m here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide photos or a short video of the motor noise and any visible damage? This will help us diagnose the issue faster.
I’ve attached a video showing the noise the motor makes when I try to blend ice cubes. There are no visible cracks or scratches.
Thank you for the video. We will send you a replacement blender at no extra cost and provide a prepaid label for returning the faulty item.
Thanks for the quick response and the replacement offer. I appreciate the prompt help and look forward to receiving the new blender.
Your replacement order has been processed and the return shipping label was emailed to you. The issue with your blender is now resolved.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement blender arrived safely and is working perfectly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we have received no further messages, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us again if you have any other problems.
